name: bokata-slicer-marketplace
description: Official marketplace entry for Bokata Slicer CC - Intelligent vertical slicing and feature decomposition

plugins.name: bokata-slicer-cc
plugins.description: Intelligent vertical slicing and feature decomposition using the Hamburger Method. Automatically detects scope, generates Walking Skeletons, provides 3-5 implementation paths, and creates comprehensive documentation with selection matrices.
